pullRequest.title: Add support for limit pushdown through union
pullRequest.bodyText:
== RELEASE NOTES ==
General Changes
* Add support for limit pushdown through union

resolve #14894

nodes.bodyText: So, theoretically, this won't fire if the limit here is > 1 either right? Maybe also test that?
